alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Androscoggin and central Cumberland Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 717 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raymond, or 7 miles south of Mechanic Falls, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Auburn, Brunswick, Bridgton, Mechanic Falls, Naples, Cumberland, Gorham, Freeport, Gray, Raymond, Standish, Lisbon, Durham, Casco, Frye Island, New Gloucester, Pownal, Poland, and North Yarmouth. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 59 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands
